channel.title: First Time Running Hyperion
channel.description:
This is my first time running hyperion, I followed this video(and used the source he's using): http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=eoYKZ2xoXLM#!
What happens is that at 3:18 when his console says ready, mine says: [code] SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:140) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Please, anyone with any idea on why this could possibly be doing this it'd be [b]greatly[/b] appreciated.

item.title: First Time Running Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

This is my first time running hyperion, I followed this video(and used the source he’s using): http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=eoYKZ2xoXLM#!

What happens is that at 3:18 when his console says ready, mine says:

SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:140) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Please, anyone with any idea on why this could possibly be doing this it’d be greatly appreciated.
